abstract: Analysts said Medtronic now has a commanding head start in the race to move artificial disk technology from the lower to the upper spine.
snippet: Analysts said Medtronic now has a commanding head start in the race to move artificial disk technology from the lower to the upper spine.
lead_paragraph: Medtronic, which late Monday became the first medical device maker cleared to sell an artificial neck disk in the United States, may also become the first company to sell a device that would compete with it.

headline.main: 2nd Medtronic Neck Disk Wins Panel Approval
headline.print_headline: 2 Medtronic Neck Disks Win Panel Approval
